ROOT.Lookup: select institution_number, institution_name from sys_institution_licence order by institution_number asc
select index_field,SERVICE_CATEGORY,institution_number from BWT_SERVICE_CATEGORY where language(+) = 'USA' and INSTITUTION_NUMBER = ':institution_number' order by institution_number,index_field asc
select index_field,business_type from BWT_CLIENT_BUSINESS_TYPE where language(+) = 'USA' and institution_number = ':institution_number' order by 1

Lookup.refreshsql: select distinct application_number as index_field, company_name || '_' || contact_name || '_' || service_contract_id as application_number, institution_number from cis_application_detail where institution_number = ':institution_number' and client_level = (CASE WHEN ':client_level' = '001' THEN '003' WHEN ':client_level' = '003' THEN '002' ELSE 'xxx' END) and service_contract_id = ':service_contract_id' order by index_field;

ROOT.Lookup: select distinct application_number as index_field, company_name || '_' || contact_name || '_' || service_contract_id as application_number, institution_number from cis_application_detail where institution_number = ':institution_number' order by index_field;
select client_number, company_name || ' (' || institution_number || ')' as name from cis_client_details where institution_number = ':institution_number' order by institution_number,client_number asc
select replace (level, '1', '001') as index_field, replace (level, '1', '001') as RISK_GROUP_ID from dual connect by level < 2
select replace(replace (level, '1', '000'), '2', '001') as index_field, replace(replace (level, '1', 'NO'), '2', 'YES') as BILLING_LEVEL from dual connect by level < 3
select replace(replace (level, '1', 'ecomm'), '2', 'pos') as index_field, replace(replace (level, '1', 'ecomm'), '2', 'pos') as AUTH_TYPE from dual connect by level < 3
select replace(replace (level, '1', 'net'), '2', 'gross') as index_field, replace(replace (level, '1', 'net'), '2', 'gross') as SETTLEMENT_TYPE from dual connect by level < 3
select replace(replace (level, '1', 'blended'), '2', 'icc++') as index_field, replace(replace (level, '1', 'blended'), '2', 'icc++') as TARIFF_TYPE from dual connect by level < 3

select replace(replace(replace (level, '1', 'sale'), '2', 'refund'), '3', 'reversal') as index_field, replace(replace(replace (level, '1', 'sale'), '2', 'refund'), '3', 'reversal') as TRANS_TYPE from dual connect by level < 4
select distinct card_number from int_transactions where institution_number = ':institution_number' and card_number not like '%*%' and transaction_status in ('004') order by 1;

select index_field,TRANSACTION_STATUS,institution_number from BWT_TRANSACTION_STATUS where language(+) = 'USA' and INSTITUTION_NUMBER = ':institution_number' order by institution_number,index_field asc
select distinct client_tariff as index_field, client_tariff as merchant_tariff, institution_number from cbr_transaction_charges where institution_number = ':institution_number' order by 1;

select index_field,RISK_RULE_GROUP_ID,institution_number from BWT_RISK_RULE_GROUP_ID where language(+) = 'USA' and INSTITUTION_NUMBER = ':institution_number' order by institution_number,index_field asc
select index_field,CLIENT_LEVEL,institution_number from BWT_CLIENT_LEVEL where language(+) = 'USA' and INSTITUTION_NUMBER = ':institution_number' order by institution_number,index_field asc
select replace(replace (level, '1', '000'), '2', '001') as index_field, replace(replace (level, '1', 'NO'), '2', 'YES') as BWT_BILLING_LEVEL from dual connect by level < 3
select index_field,COUNTRY_GROUP,institution_number from BWT_COUNTRY_GROUP where language(+) = 'USA' and INSTITUTION_NUMBER = ':institution_number' order by institution_number,index_field asc
select index_field,ACCOUNT_LEVEL,institution_number from BWT_ACCOUNT_LEVEL where language(+) = 'USA' and INSTITUTION_NUMBER = ':institution_number' order by institution_number,index_field asc

select index_field,RESIDENCE_STATUS,institution_number from BWT_RESIDENCE_STATUS where language(+) = 'USA' and INSTITUTION_NUMBER = ':institution_number' order by institution_number,index_field asc
select index_field,TERMINAL_STATUS,institution_number from BWT_TERMINAL_STATUS where language(+) = 'USA' and INSTITUTION_NUMBER = ':institution_number' order by institution_number,index_field asc
select index_field,CLIENT_STATUS,institution_number from BWT_CLIENT_STATUS where language(+) = 'USA' and INSTITUTION_NUMBER = ':institution_number' order by institution_number,index_field asc
select index_field,CLIENT_TYPE,institution_number from BWT_CLIENT_TYPE where language(+) = 'USA' and INSTITUTION_NUMBER = ':institution_number' order by institution_number,index_field asc
select index_field,SERVICE_STATUS,institution_number from BWT_SERVICE_STATUS where language(+) = 'USA' and INSTITUTION_NUMBER = ':institution_number' order by institution_number,index_field asc

Lookup.refreshsql: select index_field,SERVICE_CONTRACT,institution_number from bwt_service_contract_id where language(+) = 'USA' and INSTITUTION_NUMBER = ':institution_number' and index_field in (select distinct service_contract_id from CBR_SERVICE_CONTRACT where institution_number = ':institution_number' and contract_type = ':contract_type') order by institution_number, index_field asc

ROOT.Lookup: select index_field,SERVICE_CONTRACT,institution_number from BWT_SERVICE_CONTRACT_ID where language(+) = 'USA' and INSTITUTION_NUMBER = ':institution_number' and index_field in (select distinct service_contract_id from CBR_SERVICE_CONTRACT where institution_number = ':institution_number' and contract_type in (001, 002, 009)) order by institution_number,index_field asc
select index_field,RECORD_TYPE,institution_number from BWT_RECORD_TYPE where language(+) = 'USA' and INSTITUTION_NUMBER = ':institution_number' order by institution_number,index_field asc

Lookup.refreshsql: select index_field,TYPE_ID,institution_number from BWT_ACCOUNT_TYPE_ID where language(+) = 'USA' and INSTITUTION_NUMBER = ':institution_number' and index_field in (select distinct account_type_id from CBR_CONTRACT_ACCT_TYPES where institution_number = ':institution_number' and service_contract_id = ':service_contract_id') order by institution_number, index_field asc

Lookup.refreshsql: select ISO_CODE as index_field,swift_code as currency,institution_number from BWT_CURRENCY where language(+) = 'USA' and INSTITUTION_NUMBER = ':institution_number' and ISO_CODE in (select distinct acct_currency from CBR_CONTRACT_ACCT_TYPES where institution_number = ':institution_number' and service_contract_id = ':service_contract_id' and account_type_id = ':account_type_id') order by institution_number, iso_code asc
